Tap a Student/Doctoral Candidate/Academic Teacher Card with your device to scan it…

The selected USB device is not a supported card reader! Please try using another reader.
Insert a Student/Doctoral Candidate/Academic Teacher Card into the reader to scan it…

An error occurred. Displayed data might be outdated.
